issue.title: laser visualization for hokuyo type sensors not appearing

content.raw: unfortunately data visualization is not yet supported in gzweb. Depending on type of laser sensor, there could potentially be a large amount of data being sent from the server to the browser. We need to find an efficient approach to do this.
content.html: unfortunately data visualization is not yet supported in gzweb. Depending on type of laser sensor, there could potentially be a large amount of data being sent from the server to the browser. We need to find an efficient approach to do this.
